Welcome to PowerTap Shared Power Bank!

Please choose your payment method:
• Terminal Payment: Use the payment terminal on the device
• App Payment: Scan QR code to pay with your phone

Please follow these steps to complete payment:

1. Select payment method on the terminal
2. Insert your card or use NFC payment
3. Enter password or verify fingerprint
4. Wait for payment completion
5. Take out the power bank
Payment completed! Please take out the power bank
Payment status will be displayed here

Please scan the QR code on the right with your phone:

1. Open Alipay or WeChat
2. Scan the QR code
3. Confirm payment amount
4. Complete payment
5. Wait for power bank to pop out
Please scan QR code to complete payment
